ENGLISH: x
FRENCH: x

ENGLISH: A Call for the Dúnedain
FRENCH: Un Appel aux Dunedains

ENGLISH: The Dúnedain of the North have always been true friends and allies of the Noldor. Shall we call for aid in this hour of need?
FRENCH: Les Dunedains du Nord ont toujours été des alliés fidèles de Fondcombe. Devons-nous les appeler à l'aide, en cette heure de besoin?

ENGLISH: Yes, send swift riders immediately!
FRENCH: Oui, envoyez les cavaliers tout de suite!

ENGLISH: No, we can handle this alone.
FRENCH: Non, nous pouvons nous débrouiller seuls.

ENGLISH: War in Imladris!
FRENCH: Guerre à Fondcombe !

ENGLISH: An Elvish rider from Rivendell reaches your camp, asking that you send aid with all haste in this hour of need! Imladris is under attack!
FRENCH: Un cavalier Elfe arrive d'Imladris, et demande à ce que vous envoyez de l'aide en toute urgence à Fondcombe!

ENGLISH: Gather the men! We're leaving at dawn!
FRENCH: Rassemblez les Hommes !

ENGLISH: No, let them fight their own battles.
The Dúnedain Respond
FRENCH: L'aide des Dunedains

ENGLISH: An answer returns from the Dúnedain camps, they will answer your call to arms and honour your ancient friendship.
FRENCH: Une réponse arrive des camps des Dunedains, et elle est positive. Ils prendront les armes, et honoreront les anciennes alliances.

ENGLISH: Perhaps there is still strength in men...
FRENCH: Il y a encore de la Force chez les Hommes…

ENGLISH: Dangerous Times
FRENCH: Temps Dangereux…

ENGLISH: Enough time has passed that you may now, if needed, ask the Dúnedain for aid once again. One should not reject a helping hand in these dangerous times, but we don't want to appear weak and incapable of defending our own borders.
FRENCH: Assez de temps s'est écoulé, et vous pouvez maintenant de nouveau faire appel aux Dunedain si vous en ressentez le besoin…

ENGLISH: They are precious allies.
FRENCH: Ils sont de précieux alliés.

ENGLISH: x
FRENCH: x

ENGLISH: A Call for Erebor
FRENCH: A Call for Erebor

ENGLISH: The Dwarves of Erebor are our closest allies, and the fates of our realms are entwined. Shall we send out the call for their aid, in this hour of need?
FRENCH: The Dwarves of Erebor are our closest allies, and the fates of our realms are entwined. Shall we send out the call for their aid, in this hour of need?

ENGLISH: Yes, send an emissary immediately!
FRENCH: Yes, send an emissary immediately!

ENGLISH: No, we can handle this alone.
FRENCH: No, we can handle this alone.

ENGLISH: War in Dale!
FRENCH: War in Dale!

ENGLISH: An emissary from Dale reaches your halls, asking that you send aid with all haste in this hour of need! Dale is under attack!
FRENCH: An emissary from Dale reaches your halls, asking that you send aid with all haste in this hour of need! Dale is under attack!

ENGLISH: Baruk-Khazad! Khazad-ai-menu!
FRENCH: Baruk-Khazad! Khazad-ai-menu!

ENGLISH: No, let them fight their own battles.
FRENCH: No, let them fight their own battles.

ENGLISH: Erebor Responds
FRENCH: Erebor Responds

ENGLISH: An answer returns from the Mountain, the Dwarves are preparing a host for war, and will stand side by side with us in the coming battles!
FRENCH: An answer returns from the Mountain, the Dwarves are preparing a host for war, and will stand side by side with us in the coming battles!

ENGLISH: Feasts, meats and ale for our Dwarven friends!
FRENCH: Feasts, meats and ale for our Dwarven friends!

ENGLISH: A Call for Dale
FRENCH: A Call for Dale

ENGLISH: The men of Dale have always been true and loyal allies. Shall we ask them if they will aid us in our defensive war?
FRENCH: The men of Dale have always been true and loyal allies. Shall we ask them if they will aid us in our defensive war?

ENGLISH: Yes, send an emissary immediately!
FRENCH: Yes, send an emissary immediately!

ENGLISH: No, we can handle this alone.
FRENCH: No, we can handle this alone.

ENGLISH: War in Erebor!
FRENCH: War in Erebor!

ENGLISH: An emissary from the Dwarves of the Mountain reaches your palace, asking that you send aid with all haste in this hour of need! Erebor is under attack!
FRENCH: An emissary from the Dwarves of the Mountain reaches your palace, asking that you send aid with all haste in this hour of need! Erebor is under attack!

ENGLISH: Gather the men! We're leaving!
FRENCH: Gather the men! We're leaving!

ENGLISH: No, let the Dwarves fight their own battles.
FRENCH: No, let the Dwarves fight their own battles.

ENGLISH: Dale Responds
FRENCH: Dale Responds

ENGLISH: An answer returns from Dale, the Bardings are preparing a host for war, and will stand side by side with us in the coming battles!
FRENCH: An answer returns from Dale, the Bardings are preparing a host for war, and will stand side by side with us in the coming battles!

ENGLISH: Feasts, meats and ale for our Barding friends!
FRENCH: Feasts, meats and ale for our Barding friends!

ENGLISH: A Call for the Dúnedain
FRENCH: A Call for the Dúnedain

ENGLISH: The Dúnedain of the North have always watched over the Shire and Hobbits. Shall we call for aid in this hour of need?
FRENCH: The Dúnedain of the North have always watched over the Shire and Hobbits. Shall we call for aid in this hour of need?

ENGLISH: Yes, send emissaries immediately!
FRENCH: Yes, send emissaries immediately!

ENGLISH: No, we can handle this alone.
FRENCH: No, we can handle this alone.

ENGLISH: War in the Shire!
FRENCH: War in the Shire!

ENGLISH: A Hobbit riding a Pony from the Shire reaches your camp, asking that you send aid with all haste in this hour of need! The Shire is under attack!
FRENCH: A Hobbit riding a Pony from the Shire reaches your camp, asking that you send aid with all haste in this hour of need! The Shire is under attack!

ENGLISH: Gather the men! We're leaving at dawn!
FRENCH: Gather the men! We're leaving at dawn!

ENGLISH: No, let them fight their own battles.
FRENCH: No, let them fight their own battles.

ENGLISH: The Dúnedain Respond
FRENCH: The Dúnedain Respond

ENGLISH: An answer returns from the Dúnedain camps, they will answer your call to arms!
FRENCH: An answer returns from the Dúnedain camps, they will answer your call to arms!

ENGLISH: Beer and Pipe-weed for the Dúnedain heroes!
FRENCH: Beer and Pipe-weed for the Dúnedain heroes!

ENGLISH: War with Sauron
We are now at war with Sauron! We should ask the White Council to gather the Free Peoples to help us!
Yes, ask for help.
No help is wanted.
War with Sauron
[From.GetTitledName], a defender of Middle-Earth, is now at war with Sauron, and is requesting that the White Council call for aid.
Call all the Free People to help this Lord!
We can't do this.
A Call for Aid
[FromFrom.GetTitledName], a defender of Middle-Earth, is now at war with Sauron, and the White Council is requesting that Defenders of Middle-Earth join [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
Yes We Shall.
I can't do it
Help from a defender of Middle-Earth!
[Root.GetTitledName], I, [From.GetTitledName], will be glad to come to your aid againt Sauron and any other enemy of yours!
Great!
The White Council will join you.
[From.GetTitledName] and the other members of the White Counil have joined in your wars
We need help!
We are now at war with Sauron! We should contact the White Council, but they are unlikely to be contactable.
Of course.
We have contacted the White Council!
We are now at war with Sauron! We should ask the White Council to gather the Free Peoples to help us!
Call for aid!
I don't feel like it.
War against Evil.
Our war against [From.GetTitledName] has widened, with the members of the White Council joining [From.GetHerHim] against us.
Time to order my servants into battle.
I shall win this myself.
Sauron Commands You
Your master, Sauron, is commanding that you join him in His war against [FromFrom.GetTitledName], and [FromFrom.GetHerHim] allies the White Council.
I Hear and Obey
Response to Your Summons
Your servant, [From.GetTitledName], has joined you in your wars.
Or course
